title: Nigeta Hitsuji no Tsukamaekata
original_name: 逃げたヒツジの捕まえ方
sinopse: 1-4. Nigeta Hitsuji no Tsukamaekata (How to Catch a Runaway Sheep) 5. My Name 6. Kirakira no Kimi (Sparkling You) 7. Tenkousei no Tsunoi-kun ni wa Kaku ga Haeteiru (Transfer Student Tsunoi-kun Grew Out Horns) 8. Nil no Mizuumi (The Lake of Nil)
